TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeBaseReferenceExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

summary.span: Represents a reference to the base class.

span.span: Represents a reference to the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表目前類別的基底類別的參考。 represents a reference to the base class of the current class. 基底類別是有時也稱為父類別或超級類別。The base class is sometimes also known as the parent class or super class. 參考的基底類別常用於覆寫方法或屬性時才能呼叫該方法或屬性的基底類別的實作。References to the base class are commonly used when overriding a method or property in order to call the base class's implementation of that method or property. 例如，將字串附加至基底類別的結尾 ToString 方法的覆寫`ToString`方法會呼叫基底。在 C# 中的 tostring （)。For example, an override of a ToString method that appends a string to the end of the base class's `ToString` method would call base.ToString() in C#. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用來參考基底類別方法。This example demonstrates using a to reference a base class method. [!code-cpp[CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample/CPP/codebasereferenceexpressionexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample/CS/codebasereferenceexpressionexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeBaseReferenceExpressionExample/VB/codebasereferenceexpressionexample.vb#2)]
